Strengthen your pilot's situational awareness, streamline communication between your aircraft and Air Traffic Control, and keep your aircraft properly spaced in high-density traffic areas with Pro Star Aviation's ADS-B Out STC.
Stop procrastinating and get a solution that was designed to replace your current configuration and receive these benefits:
- Reduced separation and highly accurate departure and arrival times
- Surveillance in areas that do not currently have radar coverage
- A clear view of vehicles and runways in order to avoid collisions or delays
- More efficient spacing and optimal routing in non-radar environments, including the busy airspace in the Gulf of Mexico, mountainous regions of Colorado and the lower altitudes of Alaska
Pro Star Aviation's ADS-B Out AML STC covers:
- Bombardier Global Express - Bombardier Challenger 601 - Bombardier Learjet 40 & 45 - Cessna Citation 550, 560, 650 & 750 - Hawker 800 & 1,000
Honeywell's Primus II Radio System
When you upgrade your existing Honeywell Primus II Radio and add a stand-alone GPS receiver, you’ll enjoy a cost-effective solution combined with the latest configuration to meet the ADS-B Out mandate. Fly with confidence with Honeywell's Primus II Radio equipped with a Mode S Transponder and learn more about how this certified solution can keep you flying for years to come.
Protect Your Avionics Investment
For a limited time when you upgrade your aircraft, you can save up to $42,000 on your new or existing Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan*.
